MessageHistory.Text:
I need a dead drop:
10x Pseudo
Working on it. Should be ready in around 5 hours
The drop is ready. You can find it on the east-exterior wall of Taco Ticklers
I'm still currently waiting on a payment of <color=#46CB4F>$270</color>. Please deposit it into my stash box when you've got a chance.
You can pay off your debt by placing cash in my stash. It's on the west face of the warehouse.
Hey, you've been great to work with so I'm willing to start doing in-person meetings with you. At a meeting, you buy as much pseudo as you can carry - no more order limits.
Just send me a text if you'd like to meet.
I've received $800 cash from you. Your debt is now paid off.
Okay. I'll be in the west construction site for the next 6 hours.
Okay. I'll be under the west bridge for the next 6 hours.
